description: Relentless police brutality has not cowed protesters holding mass rallies in Belarus.
title: Belarus protesters battered, bruised but defiant after 100 days
title_page: Belarus protesters battered, bruised but defiant after 100 days - BBC News
maintext: Vladimir was badly beaten by riot police in August. He was detained and sent to the notorious Okrestina prison. "They beat us as if they wanted to kill us," he said. But after leaving prison with bruises covering his back and legs, Vladimir was even more determined to protest.
